content: Their efforts have allowed us to produce these results in the fourth quarter and certainly over the course of 2022 and I can tell you what I am most proud of, which is I know is only enabled by their individual and collective efforts is the safety performance that the team produced in 2022, producing our lowest ever FRA accident frequency ratio in the companyâs history and our 17th consecutive year of being best-in-class, best in the industry as itâs related to reportable train derailments in the industry, something to be extremely proud of. So when I look at our bulk franchise, which makes up 40% of our book, it is an extremely well-positioned in 2023, whether itâs through strong demand fundamentals, favorable compares or both, we have a setup to deliver double-digit growth in this less macro sensitive portion of our book of business.
